column3: User Query (Roman Urdu)
column4: Chatbot Response (Roman Urdu)

column3: PIA ka check-in counter kahan hai?
column4: PIA ke counters Row C mein Gate 4 ke paas hain.

column3: Serene Air ka desk kis row mein hai?
column4: Serene Air ke desk Row B mein counters 8 se 12 tak hain.

column3: Flight PK301 ka check-in kab shuru hota hai?
column4: PK301 ka check-in flight se 3 ghante pehle khulta hai.

column3: Kya mein flight se 3 ghante pehle luggage de sakta hoon?
column4: Haan, international flights ke liye 3 ghante aur domestic ke liye 2 ghante pehle.

column3: Airblue mein kitna samaan allowed hai?
column4: Airblue mein 20 kg check-in aur 7 kg hand-carry allowed hai.

column3: PK308 ka boarding pass kahan se milega?
column4: PK308 ka boarding pass PIA counter se milta hai, Row C mein.

column3: Kya mobile boarding pass chalega?
column4: Haan, mobile boarding pass Islamabad Airport par valid hai.

column3: Online check-in ke baad luggage kahan dena hai?
column4: “Online Check-In” likhe hue baggage drop counter par dein.

column3: Meri flight Dubai ki hai, konsa counter hai?
column4: Dubai flights ke liye Row A mein international check-in area hai.

column3: Qatar Airways ka check-in counter number kya hai?
column4: Qatar Airways ke counters Row A mein 1 se 6 tak hain.

column3: Check-in security check se pehle hota hai ya baad mein?
column4: Check-in security check se pehle hota hai.

column3: Check-in ke liye kaun se documents chahiye?
column4: CNIC ya passport, ticket aur vaccination certificate agar zarurat ho.

column3: Kya business class ke liye alag counter hai?
column4: Haan, business class ke liye separate counters hote hain.

column3: Extra baggage ka paisa kahan dena hai?
column4: Airline counter ya Row D ke paas baggage desk par payment hoti hai.

column3: International flight ke liye kitne baje pohonchna chahiye?
column4: Kam az kam 3 ghante pehle pohonchna behtar hai.

column3: Domestic flights ka check-in kab band hota hai?
column4: Flight se 45 minutes pehle check-in band ho jata hai.

column3: Kya self check-in kiosks available hain?
column4: Haan, entrance ke paas Departure Hall B mein available hain.

column3: Baggage wrapping service kahan hai?
column4: Gate 3 ke paas baggage wrapping counter hai.

column3: PIA counter hall ke kis side par hai?
column4: PIA counters hall ke left side par hain.

column3: Mera airline counter nahi mil raha, kya karun?
column4: Flight information screen dekhein, wahan sab counters diye gaye hain.

column3: Boarding pass kahan se print karwa sakta hoon?
column4: Information desk aur airline counters ke paas printing facility hai.

column3: Fly Jinnah ka check-in counter kahan hai?
column4: Fly Jinnah ke counters Row C mein 10 se 14 tak hain.

column3: Serene Air ka check-in open hai?
column4: Haan, Serene Air ka check-in flight se 2 ghante pehle khulta hai.

column3: Kya mera bag connecting flight tak chala jayega?
column4: Haan, international flights ke liye bag final destination tak tag hota hai.

column3: Family ke liye alag line hai?
column4: Haan, families ke liye priority lane Counter 5 ke saath hai.

column3: Fast track check-in kya hota hai?
column4: Ye sirf business aur premium passengers ke liye hota hai.

column3: Special assistance passengers ke liye konsa counter hai?
column4: Counter 1 special assistance ke liye dedicated hai.

column3: Sports equipment kahan dena hai?
column4: Oversize baggage counter Row D mein hai.

column3: Kya mein ek se zyada bags check-in kar sakta hoon?
column4: Haan, jab tak total weight airline limit mein ho.

column3: Hand-carry ka weight kitna allowed hai?
column4: 7 kg allowed hai, airline se confirm kar lein.

column3: Check-in ke baad mujhe konsa gate jana hai?
column4: Gate number aapke boarding pass par likha hoga.

column3: Kya vaccination certificate zaruri hai?
column4: Kuch destinations ke liye zaruri hai, apne sath rakhein.

column3: Trolley service kahan milti hai?
column4: Har entrance aur counter ke paas trolleys available hain.

column3: Meri flight screen par nahi aa rahi, kya karun?
column4: Information desk par ja kar staff se madad lein.

column3: PK302 ka check-in Gate 2 ke paas hai ya Gate 3?
column4: PK302 ka check-in Gate 3 ke paas hota hai.

column3: Kya printed ticket zaruri hai?
column4: Nahi, mobile e-ticket aur CNIC se bhi check-in ho jata hai.

column3: Online check-in walon ke liye alag counter hai?
column4: Haan, “Online Check-In” aur “Baggage Drop” likhe hue counters par jaein.

column3: Fragile items ke liye tag kahan milega?
column4: Counter par staff ko batayein, wo “Fragile” tag laga denge.

column3: Serene Air baggage drop kahan hai?
column4: Row B mein counter 9 aur 10 ke paas.

column3: Subha ke flights ka check-in kab khulta hai?
column4: Flight se 2 ghante pehle check-in khul jata hai.

column3: Kya power bank check-in luggage mein rakh sakta hoon?
column4: Nahi, power bank sirf hand-carry mein rakhein.

column3: Luggage ka weight check kahan karwaun?
column4: Har airline counter ke paas weighing machine hai.

column3: Mera e-ticket kho gaya hai, kya check-in ho sakta hai?
column4: Haan, CNIC dikhayein, airline staff booking dekh lega.

column3: PIA domestic flights kis terminal se hoti hain?
column4: Terminal 1, Departure Hall C se.

column3: Kya return flight ka check-in abhi ho sakta hai?
column4: Nahi, sirf current flight ka hi check-in hota hai.

column3: International check-in area kahan hai?
column4: Row A mein immigration entry ke paas.

column3: Is waqt check-in mein kitna time lagta hai?
column4: Lagbhag 15 se 25 minutes.

column3: Baby stroller check-in par de sakta hoon?
column4: Haan, stroller gate par staff ko diya ja sakta hai.

column3: Kya check-in counters 24 ghante khule rehte hain?
column4: Sirf kuch airlines ke, baqi flights se 3 ghante pehle khulte hain.

column3: Meri airline kis row mein hai?
column4: Flight screen par airline ka naam aur row number likha hota hai.
